long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Naughty or Nice List lets you create a "naughty" and a "nice" list of keyword searches for each website you visit. If the keyword appears in an open tab, you will be alerted with a flashing Chrome extension badge and a flashing favorite icon on the tab. The keyword will appear in the page with a flashing box around it, that you cannot miss. Red for your "naughty" list, and green for "nice".

This is a great tool for avoiding eBay or Amazon sellers that you don't want to do business with. Or being alerted when a friend or foe has commented on a Facebook post you're looking at. Or just to be alerted when any information that you're watching out for pops up right under your nose.

The Naughty or Nice List app is the best blacklist app, and the best whitelist app rolled into one. 

This app is a great way to make sure you notice important:
email addresses
names
phone numbers
urls
domain names
usernames
ip addresses
server names
keywords
GUIDs
account numbers
product names
contacts
